attributes.action: Ban using CCTV & Automatic number plate recognition to enforce car parking rules
attributes.additional_details: When you enter a shopping area or car park with a ticket machine you know you have restrictions.When your car is photographed going into a restaurant car park with signs high up on lampposts that you do NOT notice as you’re concentrating on driving and your children as you get out of your car, you do not see a ticket machine so therefore do not realise you have a time limit, Only to then be sent an extortionate parking ticket for staying too long,then any appeal rejected! has to be stopped now!
attributes.background: Private companies are making billions of £’s a year using this camera system which isn’t always easily seen.Most people have to work to earn their money!It’s like daylight robbery!This needs to be outlawed as immoral!Car parks with time limits should use pay & display machines so you are fully aware
